Title: Runaway Train
Writer: Djordje Milicevic (screenplay), Paul Zindel (screenplay), Edward Bunker (screenplay), Akira Kurosawa (based on a screenplay by)
Actors: Jon Voight, Eric Roberts, Rebecca De Mornay, Kyle T. Heffner
Plot: A hardened convict and a younger prisoner escape from a brutal prison in the middle of winter only to find themselves on an out-of-control train with a female railway worker while being pursued by the vengeful head of security.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
